reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major congenital cardiac defect subcategories: VSD (~2-3 per 1000 births), ASD (~1 per 1000), PDA (~0.5 per 1000), pulmonary stenosis (~0.5 per 1000), aortic stenosis (~0.5 per 1000), tetralogy of Fallot (~0.3 per 1000), coarctation (~0.3 per 1000), transposition (~0.2 per 1000), and others (~0.2 per 1000) totaling ~6.5 per 1000 live births, translating to ~13.4 per 100k person-years globally. Confidence limited due to umbrella term heterogeneity and significant geographic variation.
